content.div:
Ladies, if you needed a reason to tune into the Super Bowl this weekend, your excuse has arrived. We’ve already seen David Beckham's print ads his H&M man-panty collection (click here for a refresher), and now his new commercial for the line (which hit H&M stores this week), is set score a touchdown during the big game’s 2nd quarter. If, like us, you can't wait that long, here's a sneak peek at Beckham and his perfectly packaged bulge.

If that wasn't enough, we highly suggest taking a peek at the behind-the-scenes Beckham-y goodness. Warning: drooling over your keyboard this much may cause it to short-circuit.

entry.title: Celebrity Beauty Secrets

link.Abstract: We've got the inside scoop on how to get the stars' favourite looks. Find out how they get picture-perfect for the cameras.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Want to get picture perfect bronzed cheeks? Jennifer Lopez's makeup artist, Scott Barnes, told InStyle magazine to be careful where you apply the dust. He said, "No powder around laugh lines, nose, or eyes; it adds darkness and ages you."
link.title: Jennifer Lopez - Celebrity Beauty Secrets
